content: this is the simplified version of my very popular knitted owl slipper pattern 1 i realized that not everyone may want owls on their slippers that a more plain slipper was something that any man woman or child would wear as plain old knitted slippers if you are interested in the smaller child sizes you can try this link - **child size moccasin slippers** 2 the pattern is knitted on 2 two set of needles but don t worry i ve provided a bunch of photos to show you how to do this it sounds more complicated than it really is the pattern itself only involves the knit stitch k2tog and picking up stitches easy peasy for real i ve also added links to the how-to video showing how to make these slippers you can watch it on youtube here ** how to knit moccasin slippers 3 ** it s very simple to follow and will help with any problems you may have to read the ad supported version of the pattern in full on my website click this link ** free knitted slipper pattern 4 ** now available **the downloadable pdf ** get it here - **add to cart** now that you added it **show cart** these links are supplied by ravelry to make your purchase even easier continue with your purchase as you normally would it will then be available for you to download directly from ravelry if you re interested in any of my other free patterns you can try these links ** knitting patterns 5 crochet patterns 6 ** happy creating 1 https //kweenbee com/knitted-owl-slipper-pattern/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/child-moccasin-slippers 3 https //youtu be/zz93fyf4qdi 4 https //kweenbee com/free-knitted-slipper-pattern/ 5 https //kweenbee com/free-knitting-patterns/ 6 https //kweenbee com/free-crochet-patterns/
